LanguageData.LetterColoniesAnimalRampage: An intense psycho drone that struck from a distant place hit the spirit of the settlers!\n As a result, several people in the colony began to rampage up!
LanguageData.LetterTornadoEmergence: A tornado occurred near the colony!\nLet's keep alarmed so that settlers will not get caught.
LanguageData.LetterMeterLight: Suddenly, a lot of shooting stars fell on the surface!\nOne of them is falling for the settlers!
